dungeon.level

Class TrapRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeon.level.Room
      • dungeon.level.TrapRoom

  • public class TrapRoom
extends Room
    this class is for a basic/normal room without monster, chest or trap and this is not the entrance or the exit
    Author:
    fguilbert
